Thinking of starting with a website? Why spend a lot when you can start at $1/m!?

Serving customers since 2008, ProCloudHost.COM offers reliable web hosting with DirectAdmin servers, helpful support, 99.9% Uptime, weekly backups and 7 days money back guarantee allows you to have peace of mind. Your hosting account will be Instantly setup after payment. Using Softaculous premium you can install hundreds of scripts including wordpress, joomla and others in a minute!

By the way, We are NOT a master/alpha/reseller of some other company and manage our servers with root access.
